articles.title: Analysis finds deadly Montana avalanche triggered by riders
articles.description: MISSOULA, Mont. (AP) — An avalanche that killed two Montana snowmobilers was triggered when two riders tried to dig out a third whose snowmobile was stuck, avalanche experts said.
articles.content:
MISSOULA, Mont. (AP) An avalanche that killed two Montana snowmobilers was triggered when two riders tried to dig out a third whose snowmobile was stuck, avalanche experts said.
The West Central Montana Avalanche Center released the analysis Monday into the … [+1044 chars]

articles.title: Judge bars Arkansas circuit court candidate from election
articles.description: LITTLE ROCK. Ark. (AP) — A man seeking a seat on an Arkansas circuit court isn't qualified to run for the judgeship because of a misdemeanor traffic offense he committed as a teenager, a judge ruled.
articles.content:
LITTLE ROCK. Ark. (AP) A man seeking a seat on an Arkansas circuit court isn't qualified to run for the judgeship because of a misdemeanor traffic offense he committed as a teenager, a judge ruled.

articles.title: Delay of game: National title on hold amidst 2-week wait
articles.description: CLEMSON, S.C. (AP) — Clemson quarterback Trevor Lawrence was ready to get right back on the field to play for another College Football Playoff title after the Tigers'hard-fought semifinal win over Ohio State last month.

articles.title: Wisconsin legislator's daughter sentenced for woman's death
articles.description: GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) — The daughter of a Wisconsin state legislator was found guilty Tuesday of supplying drugs that led to the death of a pregnant woman and her baby.
articles.content:
GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) The daughter of a Wisconsin state legislator was found guilty Tuesday of supplying drugs that led to the death of a pregnant woman and her baby.

articles.title: Alabama fire chief on paid leave during state investigation
articles.description: TUSCUMBIA, Ala. (AP) — An Alabama fire chief has been put on paid administrative leave while the State Fire Marshal's Office investigates him.
articles.content:
TUSCUMBIA, Ala. (AP) An Alabama fire chief has been put on paid administrative leave while the State Fire Marshal's Office investigates him.

articles.title: Trump eyes 2 House Republicans for impeachment legal team
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Republican House members John Ratcliffe and Jim Jordan are being considered for a role on President Donald Trump's defense team for the upcoming Senate impeachment trial, a person familiar with the discussions said Tuesday.
